'''Traveling Doctor's Silver Lotus''' is an [[Artifact]] in the set [[Traveling Doctor]].

==Description==
The doctor traveled across the land in search of rare herbs, with the zeal of an adventurer.<br />On a steep cliff between slippery rocks, she found this silver lotus.<br />The lotus was never made into medicine, but its scent gave her the strength to go on from that day forward.
